Name: Parkour Tag
About the game: Parkour Tag is a platforming PvP game that faces two-players off in a competitive game of movement. Run vertically or horizontally on any wall, jump, double jump, slide, vault and more to outmaneuver your opponent and claim victory! Competition Each round one player will act as the tagger , and the other player will act as the runner . If you are the tagger , catch your opponent before the time runs out to score a point. If you are the runner , evade the tagger until time runs out to score a point. The first person to reach the score cap with a two point lead will win the game. Parkour Tag is most enjoyable with a friend, but features both public and private matchmaking options for your convenience! Movement Movement is the heart and soul of Parkour Tag. Combine different mechanics to create complex routes and out outmaneuver your opponent. Time Trials For the gamers who like to speed run, race against the clock in the time trials to try to get the fastest time possible. Courses of varying difficulty aim to challenge your parkour abilities and sharpen your platforming skillset. Optimize your routes to achieve better times and earn titles to display online. Customization Create a custom face to showoff your style and level up to earn new emotes and avatars. If you enjoy achievement hunting, complete challenges to earn unique titles to showcase your abilities. --- BEFORE YOU BUY... Please keep in mind that this game was developed by one person, hi that's me! :) What this game is NOT Free of all imperfections, visually stunning, or AAA quality. What this game IS A one of a kind platforming experience offering countless hours of entertainment, all at the price of three freshly bagged jumbo avocado's.
